topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Post-Deployment Tasks in a Sacramento Deployment

body.p: After HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade is fully installed and deployed, perform the tasks in this section.
body.section: Perform a full backupAfter the deployment is complete, do a full backup of the deployment. This will make it easier to recover should you encounter a problem. For more information, see Backup and Restore Configuration Files.

section.title: Integrate HP Virtualized Services Directory (VSD) **REQUIRED**
section.p: You must perform the following tasks to integrate HP Virtualized Services Directory (VSD).
For more information, see Integrate your Cloud with HP Virtualized Services Directory (VSD).

section.title: Verify the VSC VMs
section.p: The installation process creates virtual machines for VSC. VSC VMs are installed and are operational.
For more information, see Verifying the VSC VMs.

section.title: Verify the VRS-G Node
section.p: The installation creates a VRS-G node as part of the cloud deployment. Use the following command to verify that the VRS-G is active.
For more information, see Verifying the VRS-G Node.

section.title: Verify LDAP
section.p: You should verify that LDAP is functioning correctly.
For more information, see Verifying the LDAP Deployment

section.title: Configure SR-IOV or PCI-Passthrough
section.p: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade also supports direct guest access to NICs using PCI passthrough or SR-IOV.
For more information, see Configuring SR-IOV or PCI-Passthrough Networking

section.title: Provision Baremetal Nodes
section.p: After installing the sacramento template, follow these instructions to provision baremetal nodes.
For more information, see Provision Baremetal Nodes for the Sacramento Deployment.
